data.title: Beowulf's Children; Larry Niven, Jerry Pournelle & Steven Barnes
data.meta_description: New York: TOR, 1995. Hardcover. First Edition: Nov. 1995. 382 p.: maps; 24 cm. Dark blue cloth spine with gilt spine title; Dark blue paper over boards. Dust jacket designed by Carol Russo with jacket art by Michael Whelan. A Tom Doherty Associates book. The long-awaited sequel to the bestselling The Legacy of Heorot --dust jacket. Includes list of dramatis personae. Book and dust jacket are in Fine Condition: clean and bright. Fine / fine. Item
data.text:
New York: TOR, 1995. Hardcover. First Edition: Nov. 1995. 382 p.: maps; 24 cm. Dark blue cloth spine with gilt spine title; Dark blue paper over boards. Dust jacket designed by Carol Russo with jacket art by Michael Whelan. "A Tom Doherty Associates book." The "long-awaited sequel to the bestselling The Legacy of Heorot"--dust jacket. Includes list of dramatis personae. Book and dust jacket are in Fine Condition: clean and bright. Fine / fine. Item #005375

ISBN: 0312855222
